reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects data and explains the details related to data collection.
reply.reference: Our priority is protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy notice, or our practices with regards to your personal information...use of our Services (which include the Sites), we appreciate that you are trusting us with your...In this privacy notice, we seek to explain to you in the clearest way...what information we collect...URL: https://actuvi.com/privacy-policy/

source_documents.excerpt:
Welcome to Actuvi, (“Actuvi“, “Company“, “we“, “us“, “our“). Our priority is protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy notice, or our practices with regards to your personal information, please contact us at support@actuvi.com.
When you visit our website http://www.actuvi.com or Actuvi Application (collectively, the “Sites”), and more generally, use any of our services (the “Services“, which include the Sites), we app...

much information we collect depends on the type and settings of the device you use to access the Sites. For example, we may use GPS and other technologies to collect geolocation data that tells us your current location (based on your IP address). You can opt out of allowing us to collect this information either by refusing access to the information or by disabling your Location setting on your device. Note however, if you choose to opt out, you may not be able to use certain aspects of the Servi...

and solve any potential issues you might have with the use of our Services.
To send you marketing and promotional communications. We and/or our third-party marketing partners may use the personal information you send to us for our marketing purposes, if this is in accordance with your marketing preferences. For example, when expressing an interest in obtaining information about us or our Sites, subscribing to marketing or otherwise contacting us, we will collect personal information from you. Yo...

servers automatically collect when you access or use our Sites and which we record in log files. Depending on how you interact with us, this log data may include your IP address, device information, browser type and settings and information about your activity in the Sites (such as the date/time stamps associated with your usage, pages and files viewed, searches and other actions you take such as which features you use), device event information (such as system activity, error reports (sometimes...

are at least 18 or that you are the parent or guardian of such a minor and consent to such minor dependent’s use of the Sites. If we learn that personal information from users less than 18 years of age has been collected, we will deactivate the account and take reasonable measures to promptly delete such data from our records. If you become aware of any data we may have collected from children under age 18, please contact us at support@actuvi.com .

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects data such as geolocation data, text message information, changes made on the portal, device data, location data, personal information provided by users, and information automatically collected including IP address, browser type, device characteristics, and usage data.

content: Information automatically collected (IP address, browser type, device characteristics, usage data)

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions various types of data collected, including geolocation data, text message information, changes made on the portal, device data, location data, personal information provided by users, and information automatically collected like IP address, browser type, device characteristics, and usage data.
reply.reference: The app collects data such as geolocation data, text message information, changes made on the portal, device data, location data, personal information provided by users, and information automatically collected including IP address, browser type, device characteristics, and usage data. reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app processes information for various purposes based on legitimate business interests, compliance with legal obligations, contractual obligations, user consent, and for the fulfillment of services. These purposes include account creation, sending administrative information, providing customer support, marketing communications, security, and enforcement of terms and policies.
reply.reference: We process your information for purposes based on legitimate business interests, the fulfillment of our contract with you, compliance with our legal obligations, and/or your consent. We use personal information collected via our Sites for a variety of business purposes described below. URL: https://actuvi.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection by refusing access to location information or disabling the Location setting on their device. However, this may limit certain aspects of the services.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that users can opt out of allowing the collection of location information by refusing access or disabling the Location setting on their device, though it may affect service usage.
reply.reference: You can opt out of allowing us to collect this information either by refusing access to the information or by disabling your Location setting on your device. Note however, if you choose to opt out, you may not be able to use certain aspects of the Services. URL: https://actuvi.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app may share information with third parties based on consent, legal requirements, to provide services, protect rights, or fulfill business obligations.
reply.reference: We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services, to protect your rights, or to fulfill business obligations. URL: https://actuvi.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app may share data with Business Transfers, Affiliates, and Business Partners.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions sharing data with Business Transfers, Affiliates, and Business Partners, indicating the specific third parties with whom data may be shared.
reply.reference: Business Transfers. We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company. Affiliates. We may share your information with our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this privacy notice. Affiliates include our parent company and any subsidiaries, joint venture partners or other companies that we control or that are under common control with us. Business Partners. We may share your information with our business partners to offer you certain products, services or promotions. URL: https://actuvi.com/privacy-policy/
